info.title: LIDO to CIDOC (version 2.0)
info.general_description: ***PUBLISHED TO CIDOC SITE*** The mapping was implemented within the ATHENA project (www.athenaeurope.org). The ATHENA project is bringing together relevant stakeholders and content owners from museums and other cultural institutions all over Europe, evaluating and integrating specific tools, based on a common agreed set of standards and guidelines to create harmonised access to their content. UPDATE : Mapping file updated according to Gerald de Jong, DELVING, June 2013.

source_info.source_collection: Deutsches Dokumentationszentrum fΓΌr Kunstgeschichte - Bildarchiv Foto Marburg (http://www.fotomarburg.de/)

mapping_info.in_collaboration_with: Regine Stein, stein@zib.de, Gerald de Jong,DELVING,gerald@delving.eu

example_data_info.example_data_from: Deutsches Dokumentationszentrum fΓΌr Kunstgeschichte - Bildarchiv Foto Marburg (http://www.fotomarburg.de/)

comment.rationale: The collection we refer here contains only material mobile objects and does not describe immaterial objects independently from their carrier.
comment.alternatives: We assume that this collection may contain natural objects. If this does not hold, we should use *E22_Man-Made_Object*
comment.link_to_cook_book: Material and Immaterial objects in Collections
